mapper.html:
Hi {{8.name}},

Thank you for your recent application. We are pleased to invite you to an interview with us.

Location: {{8.location}}

Please complete the following steps to proceed with your interview:

1 Complete DISC Assessment

First, take our brief DISC assessment. This helps us understand your working style and tailor our discussion accordingly.

Start DISC Assessment
2 Upload Assessment Results

Once you've completed the assessment, upload your PDF results here.

Upload DISC PDF
3 Schedule Your Interview

After uploading your results, choose an interview time that works best for you.

Schedule Interview

We look forward to meeting you and learning more about your potential contribution to our team!

Kind Regards,

Smile Cliniq Hiring Team

Smile Cliniq
mapper.subject: Applicantion Update - Smile Cliniq
